name: Mine Rush (itch) (lilou_cormic)
description:
Mine Rush

Control a mine cart to collect gems while avoiding obstacles in this endless game.

Mouse, touch, and controller compatible.

Updated version of Mine Rush (Jam Version) for 8 Bits to Infinity Challenge #6: Weekend Update Challenge

Credits

Game created by lilou_cormic (purplecable.ca)

Contains music ©2019-2020 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

Contains assets by Kenney (www.kenney.nl) CC0 1.0
